```{r flc9-1, echo=FALSE, results="markup"}
askMC(
  "Which of the following functions is $\\int \\left[a + bx \\right] dx$? (Hint: Differentiate each of them until you find the one that matches $a + bx$.)",
  "+$ax + \\frac{1}{2}b x^2 + C$+", 
  "$ax + 2 b x^2 + C$" = "The derivative of this is $a + 4b x$, not $a + bx$.",
  "$a + b x^2 + C$" = "The derivative of this is $2 b x$, not $a + bx$."
)
```

```{r flc9-2, echo=FALSE, results="markup"}
askMC(
  "Which of the following functions is $\\int e^{-kx} dt$?",
  "+$-e^{-kx}\\,/\\,k$+",
  "$- k e^{-k x}$",
  "$e^{-kx}\\,/\\,k$"
)
```
